name: Blood Defender
description:
Your body is in danger! You, as a white blood cell, will have to look for other cells, like red blood cells, platelets or phagocytes, and use them to get more blood or fight against viruses that may enter through wounds.

-CONTROLS-

- Arrow keys or WASD to move.
- Mouse to aim.
- Space to shoot.

You can check the first screenshot for a quick tutorial, since I couldn't put one in the game.

NOTES

-Phagocytes may not move properly if you shoot them while moving.
-Made by TheInkSkeleton in 7 days (technically for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 but I ran out of time).
-All images were drawn by me in Paint.net
-Some background sounds were taken from the internet, but the rest were made by me. (It was my second time composing music :)  )
- Underwater sounds from : https://freesound.org/people/DCSFX/sounds/366159/
- Heartbeat sounds from: https://www.soundjay.com/heartbeat-sound-effect.html
I hope you like it!
